sentences.sentence: Objective To discuss the etiology of lunate avascular necrosis.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨月骨无菌性坏死的病因。

sentences.sentence: Methods Cryopreserved allogeneic lunate bone transplantation was applied to 6 cases of aseptic lunate osteonecrosis who were followed up more than 10 years.
sentences.translation: 方法应用深低温冷冻同种异体月骨移植治疗月骨无菌性坏死6例，随访10年以上。
